div.p: The default version of Erlang provided by your package manager should allow your RabbitMQ server to run, and will normally be sufficient. In all cases the minimum version required is at least R12B-3. Some functionality provided by erlang requires more recent versions.
In general use the latest non-alpha version unless you have a *really* good reason.

tr.td: Earlier versions do not support SSL well

div.p: Download a specific version of Erlang.
div.h3: Using a newer version of Erlang than the distribution repository provides
